template<class T>
bool IsEquivalent (  const T &  v1,
const T &  v2
) 
 

Retrieves whether two values are equivalent.

This template simply calls the operator== on the two values.

Parameters:
v1 A first value.
v2 A second value.
Returns:
Whether the two values are equivalent.
